label: 内覧
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: A regental title first employed in the time of Fujiwara no Tokihira （871‐909） and Sugawara no Michizane (845‐903), which gave its holders powers mostly identical with those of a kampaku (p. 77). [藤原時平、菅原道真、関白]
